results.title: Takeoff, of Atlanta Rap Trio Migos, Shot Dead at 28
results.abstract: The rapper was killed in a shooting at a bowling alley in Houston overnight.
results.byline: By Joe Coscarelli and J. David Goodman

multimedia.caption: Takeoff during a Migos performance in Los Angeles last year. The rapper was fatally shot in Houston early Tuesday morning.
multimedia.copyright: Rich Fury/Getty Images For Global Citizen

multimedia.caption: Takeoff during a Migos performance in Los Angeles last year. The rapper was fatally shot in Houston early Tuesday morning.

results.title: Christina Applegate Pours One Out for ‘Dead to Me’
results.abstract: Diagnosed with multiple sclerosis during filming of the show’s final season, Applegate was determined to finish the story. She said it was the hardest thing she’s ever done.

multimedia.caption: Christina Applegate in the final season of “Dead to Me,” premiering Nov. 17 on Netflix. “This is the first time anyone’s going to see me the way I am,” she said.
Christina Applegate in the final season of “Dead to Me,” premiering Nov. 17 on Netflix. “This is the first time anyone’s going to see me the way I am,” she said.
Christina Applegate in the final season of “Dead to Me,” premiering Nov. 17 on Netflix. “This is the first time anyone’s going to see me the way I am,” she said.
